message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you first. I think it would be perfect for you!  I'm asking for $130. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your suggestion, but I believe I can find something similar within my budget. I am willing to pay up to $100 for the product.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer.  I understand your budget constraints, but I can't go as low as $100.  Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $115?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. Considering my budget, I am still unable to meet at $115. I would like to propose $105 as my maximum offer for the product.
